bboxes.raw_text:
NEW YORK The police dogs
and fire hoses which greeted
Negro marchers on May 3, 1868,
in Birmingham. Alabama,
marked the turning point in John
F. Kennedy S commitment to civil
rights, DR.. Martin Luther King,
Jr., said today.


Writing his memories of the
late Pre- sident in the current
issue of Look Magazine, the Nobel
Peace Prize winner recalled:


"Birmingham had caused him
to revise his legislative agenda,
Civil rights, which had been on
the bottom of the list, or not
there at all, moved to the top.
liked the way he talked about
what we are getting. 1t wa sn't
something that he was getting
for you Negroes. You knew you
had an ally"


King also recalled the visit that
he and other March on Wa sh-
ington leaders paid to Kennedy
on the evening of the demon
stration.


The civil rights leader had
brought thousands of spectators
to their feet with his stirring
81 have a dream :" GRAFTON.
When Kennedy entered the room,
King said in Look, he Immediately
took King S hand and said, II
have a dream

King Says Dogs
N q de Oh unges

Jerry Oliver, IL, senior at
Phoenix Union High School. is
the Arizona Tribune Teen of
the Week.


The son of MIR. and Mrs. Fred
Oliver, l7l7 w. Sonora, Jerry
was selected s the student of
the month in October at Pubs.


He is president of the senior
class and secretary of the
Medical Explorers Club. He de-
votes several hours each week
as a volunteer at one of the local
hospitals.


The active young man is a
member ofthe Careers for Youth,
Pep Club. Junior Achievement,
Brotherhood Club and Boys
Federation. He participated in
Anytown this summer.


His busy schedule has not pre-
vented him from maintaining
high grade average.


Jerry plans to enroll in pre-
medical course at Arizona State
University or the University Of
Arizona.

Did you know that you can
soften hardened glue by adding
a few drops of vinegar to the
container? And if hard water is
a problem in your area, consider
the advantages of a Lindsay wa
ter conditioner to soften the
water used for your cooking,
bathing and laundering. Your
husband will love the benefits
and dollars. he'll save through
lower maintenance cost on the
water heater and other water
using fixtures.

A pretty glass turned over the
salt and pepper shaker will help
keep salt dry and pouring freely
during humid weather.

or recent experience
on century series aircraft

l. Engine run certification
2. Ground support equipment


certification

of AIM COL

An good food held the Church of
Christ 1745 E. Marcopa last Saturday. Pleased
variety salads by excellent cooks
Shown making final preparations from left Mesdames M.
Sherman en) Ballard Zema Wade and Willie M Lewis
